org.eclipse.gef.fx.nodes

Class HoverOverlayImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.Group
          • org.eclipse.gef.fx.nodes.HoverOverlayImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class HoverOverlayImageView
extends javafx.scene.Group
    A Group that combines two ImageViews, realizing an overlay effect (by adjusting the respective opacities) upon mouse hover.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the SimpleObjectProperty which stores the base Image of this HoverOverlayImageView.

      Returns the SimpleObjectProperty which stores the overlay Image of this HoverOverlayImageView.

      • baseImageProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<javafx.scene.image.Image> baseImageProperty()
        Returns the SimpleObjectProperty which stores the base Image of this HoverOverlayImageView.

      • createImageViews

        protected void createImageViews()
        Creates the ImageViews for the base and overlay image. Sets the opacity of the overlay ImageView to 0% and the opacity of the base ImageView to 80%.

      • getBaseImageView

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getBaseImageView()
        Returns the ImageView which displays the base Image.
        Returns:
        The ImageView which displays the base Image.
